attributes.action: Stop and Ban all Gambling adverts from social media
attributes.additional_details: Having had personal issues with gambling that started out from clicking a link on social media, I want to make others aware of the issues it can cause, not just financially but personal and family relationships. It can ruin your life. The links/adverts/stories advertised are a way to make money, and unfortunately a lot of people fall to this and get into a vicious circle of gambling/loans/debt and more serious issues like suicidal thoughts or even suicide itself. It needs to be stopped. Now.
attributes.background: Everyday when I go on social media I see adverts and scam stories that make you want to click and read more about a heart touching story, that turns out to just be a fake story where the end paragraph is advertising winnings from gambling sites. This can causes so many problems for people.
